lead_paragraph: The government and rebels have agreed on how to share the country’s ministries, a group overseeing the peace deal to end the two-year civil war said.
snippet: The government and rebels have agreed on how to share the country’s ministries, a group overseeing the peace deal to end the two-year civil war said.

headline.print_headline: Africa; South Sudan: New Unity Cabinet

abstract: Joint Monitoring and Evaluation Commission, organization striving to end South Sudan’s civil war, reports government and insurrectionists have decided how to allot country’s ministries; marks step forward for peace process.
